greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n AND n^2, where AND is the bitwise AND operator.
comment: The graph of this sequence has the shape of a tilted Sierpinski triangle. - _WG Zeist_, Jan 15 2019
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8192
program: a213541 n = n .&. n ^ 2  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Apr 25 2013
results.author: _Alex Ratushnyak_, Jun 14 2012
